const { execSync } = require("child_process");
const fs = require("fs");

const destinationFiles = ["packages/core/README.md"];

    const data = fs.readFileSync(fileToCheck, "utf8");

    destinationFiles.forEach((filePath) => {

    execSync("git add .");

}
